sentence.Network_en: She felt uncomfortable for his licentious act.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对他放肆的行为感到有点不舒服。

sentence.Network_en: It's because I'm going to have a licentious date with Miss Lai Xiang now!
sentence.Network_cn: 因为现在开始要去跟丽香小姐做淫荡约会呀!

sentence.Network_en: The licentious monarch helped bring about his country's downfall.
sentence.Network_cn: 这昏君荒淫无道,加速了这个国家的灭亡.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... eloquence n. 雄辩，口才 11。 licentious adj. 放肆的 12。 overbearing adj. 傲慢的, 专横的 13。.
最全面的词根汇总 - 豆丁网 ... licence 许可证 licentious 放荡的 illicit 违法.
Character  - Chinese Character Dictionary... ... 淫猥下流[ bawdy] 荒淫[ dissolute;licentious;debauched] 口淫[ fellatio].
字典中醟字的解释 ... (1) 酗酒[ drink excessively] (3) 淫乱[ dissolute;licentious] ◎ 醟 yòng.

list.abs: ...北巨蟹蛛（学名：Heteropoda licenti）为巨蟹蛛科巨蟹蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于山东、辽宁等地，常生活于山地或旱田。该物种的模式产地在山东、辽宁。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies.
...利氏园蛛（学名：Araneus licenti）为园蛛科园蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于北京等地。该物种的模式产地在北京。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Araneus licenti.
...北平腹蛛（学名：Gnaphosa licenti）为平腹蛛科平腹蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于山西等地。该物种的模式产地在山西。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Gnaphosa licenti<.
...里氏猫蛛（学名：Oxyopes licenti）为猫蛛科猫蛛属的动物。在中国大陆，分布于甘肃等地。该物种的模式产地在甘肃。== 参考文献 ==reflistWikispecies|Oxyopes licenti.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin licentiosus, from licentia 'freedom'

entry.tran: 不道德的；（尤指）放荡的，淫乱的
entry.def: If you describe a person as licentious, you mean that they are very immoral, especially in their sexual behaviour.

example.tran: 关于放荡淫乱行为的骇人听闻的故事

means.word_mean: 1. lacking moral discipline; especially sexually unrestrained;

auth_sentence.content: His eloquence becoming more and more licentious and vituperative.
auth_sentence.res_content: His eloquence becoming more and more licentious and vituperative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His eloquence becoming more and more licentious and vituperative.

auth_sentence.content: He is all that is worst in the aristocracy. Profligate, licentious and godless.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is all that is worst in the aristocracy. Profligate, licentious and godless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is all that is worst in the aristocracy. Profligate, licentious and godless.

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
licen允许+t+ious……的→允许做[任何事情]→放肆的
licence[[n.自由,放肆]]→n.[licence]许可证,执照 v.准许,认可
licence[[n.自由,放肆]]→n.[licence]许可证,执照 v.准许,认可
